entry.title: Making AsicBoost irrelevant
entry.summary: On May 10, 2016, Peter Todd via bitcoin-dev proposed a hard-fork as part of the HK agreement. AsicBoost optimization, which is patented, would be made useless with this hard-fork. The hope is to also render further similar optimizations useless. However, in the interest of clarity, there was a request for clarification on who would be included in the "we."
